text: The Benchwarmers is a 2006 American sports-comedy movie. It was directed by Dennis Dugan and was produced by Adam Sandler and Jack Giarraputo. The Benchwarmers was released on April 7, 2006. == Reception == The movie gained negative reviews from critics and holds a 11% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. Schneider was nominated for a Razzie Award for Worst Actor. == Cast == * Rob Schneider as Gus Matthews * David Spade as Richie Goodman * Jon Heder as Clark Reedy * Jon Lovitz as Mel Carmichael * Nick Swardson as Howie Goodman * Craig Kilborn as Jerry * Molly Sims as Liz Matthews * Tim Meadows as Wayne * Amaury Nolasco as Carlos * Bill Romanowski as Karl * Reggie Jackson as himself * Max Prado as Nelson * Danny McCarthy as Troy * Sean Salisbury as Brad * Matt Weinberg as Kyle * John P. Farley as Swimmer Boy * Terry Crews as Steven (Poker Guy #1) * Dennis Dugan as Coach Bellows * William Daniels as K.I.T.T. (voice) * Joey Gnoffo as Marcus Elwood ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2006 comedy movies Category:2000s sports comedy movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:2000s buddy movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:English-language movies Category:Buena Vista International movies Category:Movies directed by Dennis Dugan
title: The Benchwarmers
